name: Crazy Aliens 2020 (Smazogz of Smazlabz)
description:
Crazy Aliens 2020 is inspired by the classic 1979 Space Invaders and the equally as 'almost; classic Deluxe Galaga; complete with vast arrays of fire powers with tens of thousands of aliens trying to get through to Earth's defences.  Features over 100 levels, bonus levels and a story line that covers the entirety of known space.  Filled with humour, intergalactic madness and a story-line based around the strongest energy force in the Universe; the Eye of Zorak.

Addictive from the offset with plenty of wow factor as levels progress.  Comes with 2 player simultaneous co-op mode, hi-score chart, shops and has a hidden cheat granting infinite weapon refills.

Well worth 3 of your Earth dollars so please, please do make a purchase.
